name: Anima Interactive Guide
description:
Explore the features and learn what you can do with Anima. 


In this file, you will find a set of components that already included Anima features on them.


Features included in this file:

  • Widget library components
  • Media - Video, Gif, Lottie
  • Embed code
  • Text input
  • Entrance animation
  • Hover effect
  • Parallax scroll
